relation: Sports and clubs are available but I tend to stay as far from Henry Ford Community College as possible.
Food is good well at least when you are starving I usually get the same thing.
The academics isn't tough if you apply yourself you will be good to go.
If you attend class every session and study you are guaranteed to pass.
HFCC is pretty much a high school. The environment is very diverse which is good. But too much high school level things are constantly going on.
pageTitle: Henry Ford Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111374=I love it. I've only gone there for two semesters over a year ago but I love the teachers. I'm currently enrolling in the Fall 2012 semester to finish my degree, 131046=Henry Ford is an excellent school with helpful and knowledgeable teachers. I have enjoyed the last 3 years I have spent there and look forward to the next 2 years I will spend in the nursing program. I expect to graduate with my RN in December 2013., 196382=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments What to do for fun Join career related programs or workout at the gym Food and Dining It isn't a wide selection of food Dorm Life No dorms on campus Academic Rigor Manage your time wisely Tips for prospective students Make the best of your education. In three sentences HFCC is overall a great school to attend. The professors are very helpful when it comes to getting the information you need as a student. I would say that HFCC is one of the best community colleges in Michigan. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jasmine from Detroit, MI 05/29/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 52 Categories Comments
